boardgame.name: Zombicide Saison 2: Prison Outbreak
Zombicide Season 2: Prison Outbreak
Зомбицид. Штурм тюрьмы
無盡殺戮第二季：牢獄重圍
boardgame.description: Zombicide Season 2: Prison Outbreak takes the players to an indoor environment with vicious close-ranged fights, Prison Outbreak contains all the needed material for a new player to enter the Zombicide universe, and lots of content, almost all new, for an existing Zombicide player to expand his game experience. In fact, Prison Outbreak holds even more material than the core game published in 2012 (now nicknamed Season 1)!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Prison Outbreak will feature berserker zombies. They_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;re really tied to each other. Prison tiles display tortuous alleys, small rooms and doors everywhere, filled with berserker zombies immune to ranged weapons. You have to think fast, foresee the improbable and jump into melee at every turn. This is like a modern dungeon where levers are replaced with switches to open or lock doors, use security rooms and reach secret areas._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Prison Outbreak also contains six new survivors with their Zombivor aspects. These survivors are really designed to act as a team, as their skills really complement each other. They_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;re precious assets to any Zombicide team._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Missions featured in the rulebook form a campaign on their own, as survivors battle to turn a zombie-filled prison into a reliable shelter. Many challenges await them, but they have new tools of the trade: riot shields, automatic shotguns, concrete saws and many more toys. There_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s even an alternate ending._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Also includes Brad and his Zombivor version, a Kickstarter exclusive. Whats include: == Fugitive pack (Red Dice, Orange Dice, extra zombies, Promo set 1 - Pack 1: Aunt Rose : Survivor _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Zomb_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ivor Brad : Survivor _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Zomb_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ivor Kirk : Survivor _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Zomb_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ivor Ralph : Survivor _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Zomb_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ivor Thaissa : Survivor _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Zomb_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ivor Dakota : Survivor _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Zomb_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ivor Lea : Survivor _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Zomb_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ivor Adriana : Survivor _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Zomb_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ivor Rick : Survivor _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Zomb_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ivor == and all Kickstarter exclusives: Survivors that could be bought. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; There will be two shipments because I hope (as I know now) the first part of the items will getting in August and second in December. Includes Toxic City Mall. Reserved for user throwingmuse in Auction

Cool Mini Or Not (CMNGUG0016) A cooperative game of zombie hunters in a gloomy prison, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The world is at WAR against a hungry horde of ZOMBIES born from our own hubris. While most people chose to flee and became prey, WE chose to STAND and become PREDATORS. We are survivors, and we FIGHT against death itself with every weapon available. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s time to engage in... ZOMBICIDE!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Zombicide Season 2: Prison Outbreak is a collaborative game for 1 to 6 players, ages 13 and up. A game can last for 30mn (beginner board) to 4 hours (expert board). Each player controls between one (for 6 players) and six (solo game) survivors of different backgrounds and origins, all battling zombies in a prison and its surrounding areas. Through the missions featured in the game, your team tries to clean out the prison and make it into a safe haven. Good luck - you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re going to need it. Survivors must accomplish specific goals while constantly battling zombies and gaining new skills in the process. Be careful, however: the Danger Level rises with your experience, and the more zombies you kill, the more zombies come for you. In the end, swarms of zombies block your path to victory. Luckily, you have the will and the weapons to kill them all! Zombicide Season 2: Prison Outbreak is designed both as a stand-alone game for new players and an expansion for Season 1 owners. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a fast-paced, fun, and easy-to-learn game with action movie characters and themes. Your team must develop innovative tactics to find the balance between survival against all odds and furious zombie hunting. Cooperation and friendship are your best tools to achieve victory. Engage in a Zombicide with your family and friends (ages 13 and up)!

Prison Outbreak + Kickstarter Inmate level extras Right now I will send out Prison Outbreak and the wave 1 extras that have been received. This includes: -kickstarter exclusive survivors -zombie dogs -dog companions -2 extra sets of dice -extra zombies of all 3 types(regular, toxic, berserk) -extra spawn cards -2 extra sets of custom dice shipping is $15 to lower 48. (if you want the wave 2 extras, It will just be another $15 for shipping when it arrives)
Bought new, played about a half-dozen times. Complete and well cared for.

Brand New Shrink Wrapped copy of Zombicide Season 2: Prison Outbreak Note: Assuming the buyer is willing I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll try to complete all paperwork required by the BGG Market Place on the day of purchase and have the item packed and shipped on the next working day. Postage within the UK will normally be by courier(3-5 working days) with a charge of £5.99 for this item. If you want to make multiple purchases contact me and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll consolidate postage. I will ship items to Europe, price to be agreed on request. On items under 2Kg postage can still be quite reasonable. It gets more expensive if a courier has to be used. Thanks for looking. Barry

Includes hard to find Kickstarter Exclusives and add-ons. This is for Zombicide 2 Kickstarter Fugitive Pledge along with its KS bonuses _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; exclusives. Additionally it also includes ton of additional kick starter exclusive add-ons. Almost all games components are Unopened. Everything in Excellent and new/like new condition. Here is the complete List of on what_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s included: 1) Fugitive Kickstarter Pledge along with its KS Bonuses _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Exclusives. Please see https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/coolminiornot/zombicide-season-2/description for more details. It Includes: 1a) Prison Outbreak, 1b) Toxic City Mall Expansion, 1c) Zombie Dogs (Set # 5), 1d) Box of 6 Dog Companions (Set #6), 1e) Zombicide Set #2: Survivors _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Zombivors, 1f) Zombicide Set #3: Survivors _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Zombivors, 1g) Special Red Dice, 1h) Special Orange Dice, 1i) 31 bonus Zombies (4 toxic Walkers, 4 Berserker Walkers, 2 Fatties, 1 Toxic Abomination, 2 Berserker Runners, 4 Runners, 1 Abomination, 1 Berserker Fatty, 1 Toxic Fatty, 8 Walkers, 2 Toxic Runners, 1 Berserker Abomination), 1j) Extra Spawn Cards for Berserker, Toxic Zombie, and Walk of Dead 2. 2) Moustache Pack Kickstarter Exclusive Add-on 3) 8 Kickstarter Exclusives Survivors Add-On: Helen, Adriana, Rick, Will, Lea, Ross, Dakota, Fred Shipping _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Handling: $50. Everything in hand and ready to ship.
Mostly still in shrink postage to mainland UK included.

This is a lot of Zombicide stuff, which I no longer play with. Condition marked as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; because there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s some minor box damage and some mini_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s are painted - no components are damaged in any way. No components are missing (Unless a wizard has interfered since I last played). Some bits are painted, which I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll mention in comments (No promo survivors are painted) Core Stuff: Zombicide: Season 1 (Retail) (All base-game zombies are primed, I think about half are painted) Zombicide: Season 2 (Kickstarter) (Mostly un-touched, there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a painted toxic fatty and 3 painted berserker walkers). Zombicide: Toxic City Mall (Kickstarter) Zombie Dogs (Primed, Unpainted) Companion Dogs (Primed, I think 2 are painted) Survivors: Brad, Will, Wanda, Don, Fred, Chuck, Rose, Rick, Raoul, Shannon, Achille, Gary, Mack, Smith, Frank, Rob, Watts, Kim, Thaissa, Joshua (Painted), Ned (Painted), Grindlock, Kirk, Derek, Ralph, Belle, Phil, Doug (Painted), Elsa, Josh, Amy, Neema _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Mike. All is contained in the Prison Outbreak and Toxic City Mall boxes with a foam-core insert I made. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to provide further images if you ask for it, just throw me a mail. Shipping - First £15 free, if its_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; much more than that I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll ask you to pay the difference.
For user gusjustgus1 ONLY paypal: keuschbr@gmail.com Shipping: $16 USPS priority total: $36

Cool Mini Or Not (CMNGUG0016) A cooperative game of zombie hunters in a gloomy prison, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The world is at WAR against a hungry horde of ZOMBIES born from our own hubris. While most people chose to flee and became prey, WE chose to STAND and become PREDATORS. We are survivors, and we FIGHT against death itself with every weapon available. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s time to engage in... ZOMBICIDE!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Zombicide Season 2: Prison Outbreak is a collaborative game for 1 to 6 players, ages 13 and up. A game can last for 30mn (beginner board) to 4 hours (expert board). Each player controls between one (for 6 players) and six (solo game) survivors of different backgrounds and origins, all battling zombies in a prison and its surrounding areas. Through the missions featured in the game, your team tries to clean out the prison and make it into a safe haven. Good luck - you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re going to need it. Survivors must accomplish specific goals while constantly battling zombies and gaining new skills in the process. Be careful, however: the Danger Level rises with your experience, and the more zombies you kill, the more zombies come for you. In the end, swarms of zombies block your path to victory. Luckily, you have the will and the weapons to kill them all! Zombicide Season 2: Prison Outbreak is designed both as a stand-alone game for new players and an expansion for Season 1 owners. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a fast-paced, fun, and easy-to-learn game with action movie characters and themes. Your team must develop innovative tactics to find the balance between survival against all odds and furious zombie hunting. Cooperation and friendship are your best tools to achieve victory. Engage in a Zombicide with your family and friends (ages 13 and up)!
